text: "Sheni gulistvis" (, ) is a song performed by Georgian Ethno-Jazz Band Iriao,. The song was released as a digital download on 13 March 2018. The song was written by Irina Sanikidze and produced by David Malazonia and Mikheil Mdinaradze. ==Eurovision Song Contest== It represented Georgia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal. It was the first song to be performed entirely in Georgian in the contest's history. The song competed in the second semi-final, held on 10 May 2018. It did not advance to the grand final. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! Region ! Date ! Format ! Label |- ! scope="row"| Various | 28 March 2018 | Digital download | Universal Music |} ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:Eurovision songs of 2018 Category:Eurovision songs of Georgia (country)
title: Sheni gulistvis
